manifest.install:
CREATE TABLE `ims_wx_yj_users` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `rid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `md5` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `headurl` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `nickname` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `let` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `uniacid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `addtime` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `rid` (`rid`,`uniacid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
CREATE TABLE `ims_wx_yj_winning` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `headurl` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `nickname` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `addtime` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
manifest.uninstall: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_wx_yj_users`; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_wx_yj_winning`;
